case.state: My friends told me to meet them here... I wonder where they are?
I've been everywhere in Academy City. How come I've never noticed this place before?
A-Accelerator!? ...Wait a sec... Sorry 9S, I thought you were someone else, hehe.
Hey, Atsuko, you're a student and a magic user? I didn't think Academy City had schools for magic.
Your outfit, L'Arachel... Are you part of the church? A different sect, perhaps?
Miko, you're a magic user, huh...? You're not associated with the church are you?
Pit! You have angel wings!? Th-that means you might be a...!
Heh!? What a cute robot, Shimakaze... reminds me of the cleaning bots in Academy city!
Eh!? We're playing poker outdoors? Kinda strange if you ask me...
Hey! I've never met any of you girls before! I'm Mikoto Misaka! I hope we can become good friends, hehe!
There's certainly a lotta guys here... What am I getting in to?
Hello everyone, I'm Mikoto Misaka! I'm a level 5 Esper, so don't screw with me!
A game of poker, huh... count me in! I'll show you just how skilled I really am!
I'm always up for making new friends! What're we playing? Poker or somethin'?
Heh! I don't even need to swap any cards!
Hmmm... I'll take ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I've got this! Give me ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I think I'll go for... ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, that should do it!
Zap me ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~... hehe!
Hey, you must be the people my friend Kuroko told me about... I must warn you, I'm pretty good at poker!
I didn't think places like this were so easily found in Academy City. There's that policy about public nudity...
Have you guys seen my friend Kuroko around here? She's got twin-tails and an annoying attitude...
Just so you guys know, I'm kinda good at poker! I got the highest score on the poker machines at the arcade!
Alright! A great hand! I picked up a few tricks playing the poker machines at the arcade.
There's no way I can lose now!
You might as well give up!
Just what I expected! I am the 3rd ranked level 5 Esper, after all!
Hah! Good luck beating this hand, guys!
Don't be so `shocked' when I beat you this round!
Alright! I can't go wrong with these cards!
You'd need to pull out all the stops to beat me this round!
I'm kinda confused where my friend Kuroko is... She said to meet a new group of friends here.
I always love meeting new people! Never thought I'd do it over a game of strip poker... hehe.
My friend Saten is supposed to be here, somewhere. She wears a large flower ribbon in her hair, green eyes, too. Have you seen her?
So, are any of you Espers? I'm an electromaster. Means I can summon and control lightning!
Hmm... this could go either way...
Yeah... these might get me through.
These cards are okay. I can work something out.
Not the best... But, at least I can make use of these.
I hope these will work...
These look good enough... no problem!
You gotta make use of what you are given, I suppose.
I've played enough to know this might be a good hand... I hope...
So, you're the guys my friend Kuroko told me about. You any good at poker?
I'll have you know, I don't like losing!
I think Uiharu said she'd be here, too. Have you seen her? She wears a flowery headband, kinda short.
Dunno how I've ended up playing strip poker of all things, but if it means I get to prove myself then... *gulp* ...I guess I gotta do this.
Sheesh... these cards!
Give me a break... such a bad hand!
This is so annoying! What can I do with these?
Gah! I usually have better luck at the arcade!
Kuroko! Where are you!? Quit messing with my cards!
Uh-oh... It might be me this round...
Seriously!? How is it I ended up with these!?
Ugh... such rotten luck!
I suppose it's easier for everyone if you're speaking in English.
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of poker game is this?
It can't be too bad, right? Everyone else seemed okay with it.
It feels kinda weird having to strip outside of my dorm room...
So annoying! I was doing great...
I'm sure my friend Saten would have something positive to say about this... She's always one for encouraging people.
Heh! At least I'm still ahead of you guys!
Hey... it was bound to happen at some point. Don't expect it to happen again, though!
Heh! I'll cut you guys a break! Don't expect me to lose on purpose again!
Heh! It's just one small hurdle. I'll be back on my feet in no time!
So irritating! I thought I'd got the hang of this.
What!? M-me!? I guess I couldn't stay covered up forever, eh?
Gaah! I was trying so hard to not have to show my panties...
Those poker tips from Uiharu got me this far at least...
I kinda want to weasel my way outta this, but everyone else'll think I'm a sore loser...
It's too bad my electromaster abilities can't help me outta this situation...
I've managed to hold on this long, but I guess it's time to take off... *gulp*... my panties.
I suppose being a level 5 isn't all it's cracked up to be. I still ended up having to show my... you know...
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of poker game is this?
You've got to be kidding me, I gotta strip!? Fine... I don't intend on losing.
Now I gotta take off something, huh? Don't think you'll make me do it again!
I gotta strip again... maybe I'll take it easy.
I get better hands without even trying over at the arcade. Yet here, I lose...
*gulp* Now I'm on to the bigger stuff...
Well... uhhh ...I don't have any of my smaller stuff left.
Another bad hand... I'm playing like a level-2 here.
Ya know... I'm kinda getting use to this stripping thing. It's like being back in the shower rooms!
You know... I'm getting kinda used to having to strip in front of you guys.
I suppose it's just like being in your bikini, not that I mind anyway.
Really!? B-but that means I'll be showing you my...*gulp* panties...
It's just like wearing a bikini... It's just like wearing a bikini...
All I have left is my underwear!? ...which means...
I bet you're wondering what I got under these, huh?
*gulp* Well, this is it... I-I'm not sure how I feel about this...
Please don't tell Saten and the others that you're gonna see me naked, okay?
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of poker game is this?
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of game is this?
My friend, Kuroko, told me she found a new hang-out spot... I did not expect it to involve stripping off your clothes!
I have to strip again!? I don't get it... why are my cards so bad!?
This can't be right!? Which one of you is messing with my cards!?
This is getting irritating! I'm all out of small stuff!
Have any of you seen a guy with black, spiky hair around here? That punk is the most unluckiest guy I know...
W-wait! Are you sure I have to strip... again?
I'm almost positive this is Kuroko's doing... just you wait, Kuroko!
Why's it always gotta be me!? Is someone messing with these cards?
(Don't give up now, Misaka, you got this)
Whaa...!? Now I gotta show my panties too. It's just not fair.
This really is rotten luck! What could be happening to me!?
I'm down to my underwear already! And now I gotta take of my... *gulp*
There's this very unlucky guy I know... Touma or somethin'... This must be what it's like for him everyday, huh?
Whaaa!? B-but how?! Do I seriously have to remove my... *gulp* panties?
Kurokooo! This is such a terrible prank! When I get back, you're gonna pay!
I suppose... I'll take off my shoes to begin with. It counts, right?
I'll go for something small. I think my shoes are a good start. They do count, right?
I'll take off my socks...
At least I'm not gonna be showing anything... important.
Umm... Yeah! ...I'll take off my cardigan.
My cardigan won't be too exposing... hehe.
(I think I'll have to take off my skirt.) H-hey! Don't look, okay?
What're the chances I'd have to strip again?
Hey, y-you wouldn't laugh at a girl's choice in underwear, would you?
Just don't laugh at my underwear... Kuroko got them for me, ya know...
W-well... *gulp* ...here goes...
H-hey! Don't think this means we're close or anything, okay!?
I think it's gotta be my bra... (Ehh? Why am I not that embarrassed about it?)
Well, I kinda feel like I'm with close friends now soooo.... It shouldn't be that big of a deal, right?
W-well... here goes...
Please don't stare. It's embarrassing enough as it is!
There we go... A lot more comfortable now.
Tadaaa! Just like being back at the dorm!
...I like going barefoot anyway!
Well... that's it for my smaller stuff. Maybe I shoulda worn my Gekota ribbon.
I was getting kinda hot in that thing...
Now I'm not as restricted! Bring on the next round!
So what if I'm wearing shorts? You shouldn't even be looking there!
Yeah? I wear these because I like them, okay!?
H-hey! it's perfectly normal for girls to wear cute underwear like this!
See! As if I'd wear something like this...hehehe.
It's kinda embarrassing just being in your underwear, but I feel okay with it with you guys...
Kuroko sees me like this most nights. Kinda glad she isn't here to screw with me.
J-just don't stare too much, okay.
Don't tell anyone that you've seen them, please.
D-don't make such a big deal outta this, okay...
As long as this just stays between us...
Heh! Serves you right, ~player~! Boys aren't that great at this kind of thing!
Wow, you mustn't be trying very hard, ~player~. Maybe you were... boys are kinda idiotic...
Hehehe! I bet you're trying to lose on purpose aren't you, ~player~?
This guy... What does ~player~ think he's trying to pull here?
If I was to guess your level, ~player~... I'd say you're about a level 1! Hehe!
Just don't go thinking that you'll win the next round, ~player~!
It's not like I'm interested or anything but you gotta strip something.
I'm getting kinda warm... It's not because ~player~ has to strip or anything like that!
I bet you were hoping it was me who had strip, huh, ~player~.
Hehe! I had a feeling that you'd be the one to lose this round, ~player~!
Hey, ~player~... I won't look if you don't want me to.
I'll try to lose the next round if you want me to, ~player~...
Ummm... ~player~.... Do you want to get naked with me?
I w-was hoping that you'd lose that round, ~player~...
Did me t-touching myself... -hnng- ...make you w-want to lose the round, ~player~?
I think you l-lost that round... -unnf- ...on purpose, ~player~.
You're gonna be as naked as me soon, ~player~. I... wouldn't mind that ...hehe...
Heh! I can't wait to see you take off more clothes, ~player~!
Don't think you'll impress me with whatever you take off.
It's not that I care to see ~name~ strip off.
You're just like all the other boys I know. You just wanna show off!
This looks like it could be kinda fun! Uhh... I mean... Eww, don't wanna see you take off anything!
Ha! ~name~ has to remove some clothing!
I'm only just getting started! What're you gonna remove, eh!?
Heh! I take it you had a bad hand!
Alright! I win this round!
As if you'd have a better hand than me!
At least I got through that round without stripping...hehe.
Wow, so ~name~ has to strip off something... I don't even wanna look!
I think I get why my friend Saten wanted to try this out sometime...
Heh! So ~name~ has to strip! Just don't make a show of it, okay.
Hehe! My cards were better than ~name~'s! It's your turn to strip!
This means you gotta strip, ~name~? Just 'cause I'm a level 5 doesn't mean you gotta impress me or anything...
Oooh..What are you gonna take off?
I'm near enough naked ~name~! It better be something big!
Hehe! Looks like we're all gonna be showing some skin tonight!
Heh! You'll be as naked as me soon!
Hah! That's what I thought, ~name~! What are ya gonna take off?
Those cards are getting as bad as mine! I swear something is up with them...
H-hey ~name~... -hnng- ...you gotta strip.
T-that hand wasn't y-your... -unnf-... best, ~name~.
Hehe! Sooner or later, you're gonna be as naked as I am!
Hah! Looks like you didn't win this round, ~name~!
Getting closer to the end! Maybe we can get some crepes later, okay?
Not a great hand, ~player~? I better make sure that doesn't happen to me!
It'll probably be me who has to strip next round, ~player~. It is kinda based on luck, after all.
Maybe I'll let you in on my poker tricks after this, ~player~!
It's all part of the game, ~player~!
Yeah! I got this round! There's nothing like a bit of friendly competition, ~player~!
It's not looking good for you, eh ~player~?
Ya know... It's not too bad once you get in to it!
Ooooh... I'm kinda interested in seeing what ~player~'s gonna do here!
At least you're still in the game, ~player~!
I bet we'd make great friends, ~player~! Going ahead and stripping in front of others takes guts. I like that!
Us girls can show the boys how it's done, ~player~!
Hey, ~name~, let's both be in our underwear, okay?
We'll both be naked soon, ~player~.
I'm glad that you're stripping down too, ~player~. I don't want to be naked when you aren't.
Why don't y-you come... -hnng- ...join me, ~player~?
I hope I get to s-see you... -hnnf- ...naked, ~player~.
Hey, ~player~, getting naked is actually more fun than I expected!
We should totally meet up after this, ~player~. You're really great, ya know!
Heh! I bet it doesn't even bother you, huh?
If you gotta strip, go for something light.
It's okay, ~name~. Just go for something small if you can.
I'm kinda glad my friend Kuroko isn't here. She get's... excitable ...around girls.
At least it isn't me this round...
Come on ~name~, you've gotta remove some clothing!
That hand was not in your favor! What ya gonna take off, ~name~?
Those cards look pretty bad.
I'm sure you'll get a better hand next round!
Maybe you should hang out at the arcade with me... pick up some tips!
All right! Here we go!
Looks like you've gotta strip ~name~! What ya gonna take off next!
Imagining my friend Uiharu in this kinda situation is making me giggle a bit... hehe! She's kinda timid!
Ahhh... that's quite a bad hand ~name~! What are you gonna take off!
Don't feel too bad about it, ~name~. The game's not over yet!
We're friends now, right? It shouldn't be too bad for you to strip in front of me.
Yeah! I won this round! Looks like you won't get to see anything special this time!
This is getting interesting! What're you taking off!?
What kinda card choice was that!? I'm starting to think you want to get naked!
It's okay ~name~, stripping down isn't as bad as it seems!
Hey, you've got this! It can't be worse than where I'm at!
Hehe! We'll all be naked soon enough! These cards just keep getting worse!
I b-bet you wish you h-hadn't... -hnng- ...t-traded in those cards, huh ~name~.
Hey, you g-gotta strip ~name~... -Oh wow-...
No worries, ~player~! It's really not that bad once you get used to it!
It can't be much worse than where I'm at right now... hehe...
I feel like we know each other so well now! We should go visit the entertainment district later.
Wow... it's a tie!? Kinda rare to see that happen!
I didn't even think this was possible...!
A tie? That's... -hnng- ...kinda rare!
Woah!? A tie! Ya don't see that everyday!
Seriously!? Someone like you deserves to take off more.
I bet you're enjoying this, aren't you!?
You're seriously only gonna remove your ~clothing~? Just give it up already!
You're only gonna remove your ~clothing~!? Don't think it'll help you much.
Seriously? Your ~clothing~ barely ~clothing.ifPlural(count|counts)~!
Oh, just your ~clothing~, huh? You'd better hurry it up!
Ugh...fine, take off your ~clothing~ if you want.
Fine... at least it isn't something that I care about.
I'm almost down to my underwear, and you're only gonna take off your ~clothing~!?
Is there anything metallic on your ~clothing~? I could pull it off for ya!
Only your ~clothing~!? It's not like I expected much...
Maybe you should let me take your ~clothing~ off for you?
Your ~clothing~? I guess I'm in no position to complain.
As long as it gets you one step closer to losing the game, I'm all for you removing your ~clothing~, ~name~.
T-taking off your...~clothing~?
Only your ~clothing~? It's not much, considering where I am.
Let me fry it off you, hehe! I'll buy you a new one, later.
Hey!? Just what're you tryin' to pull? I've seen that kinda tech before! Academy City is considered the most advanced city after all!
It's not like this changes anything, though.
I coulda just used my electrical ability to fry that off of you instead!
I thought all boys wanted to show off, removing your ~clothing~ doesn't really reveal much.
There's nothing really special about such a small item... why even bother, eh!?
I shoulda just pulled that off you myself!
Well, whatever. Maybe next time, eh?
That's gotta be the last small thing you have, right!?
I'd totally have taken off more than that, hehe!
I was kinda hoping you'd go for something... bigger.
Hey, do you all wanna go to the lookout point after this? There's a great view of Academy City up there!
It must b-be some kinda... -uhhn- ...strategy.
Well... at least you're closer to where I'm at...
Hehe! Make sure you don't lose track of it!
Have you ever heard of an Esper before? There's a lotta science behind it but, basically, we emit an energy field that we manipulate to manifest our powers...
Anyone else here from Academy City, too? It's an entire city based around academic research and progress, hence the name...
All the Espers in Academy City are placed in to a power bracket. The weakest are placed at Level 0, up to the strongest at Level 5...
I wonder which district of Academy City I'm in? You see, Academy City is split up in to 23 districts, each with a specific purpose and function...
Woah!? Did you just transform in to a... snake or something!?
Ehh!? Shimakaze? Did you just burn off your ~clothing~!? Are you a pyrokineticist, or something?
I've seen a lotta strange stuff done with magic, but this is somethin' else!
Ehh!? You burned off your ~clothing~, Shimakaze? Espers with the pyrokineticist ability can do that...
I don't recognize that uniform... are you from Academy City?
I don't recognize that school uniform... are you from Academy City?
Ahhh! I bet you're just as cute without your ~clothing~!
Removing your ~clothing~!? It must be kinda important to you, huh?
You're ~clothing~ must mean something to you. Since you're now only just removing ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
No big deal... it's only your ~clothing~.
It look's kinda pretty! Where did ya get it from?
Hey, I can understand why you'd only want to remove your ~clothing~.
If it was my friend Uiharu, I'd bet she'd take off one flower from her headband each round!
Taking off your ~clothing~, huh? Does that even count?
Just your ~clothing~? That's no big deal, right?
Ah, your ~clothing~!? It must be kinda important.
You can't keep a girl from her ~clothing~! Unless, ya know, we're playing a stripping game.
Going to remove your ~clothing~ huh?
Ya know, Uiharu would have probably done the same. She's kinda timid like that.
Your ~clothing~ still c-counts....?
Taking off your ~clothing~, huh.
If I had the Telekinesis ability, I'd totally try to take it off of you myself!
Woah!? Shimakaze, are you okay? That's a serious hit you took!
Waah!? Shimakaze, you're not looking too good... you sure you're okay?
I've never seen anything like this before! Y-your not gonna attack me or anything, are you?
I this some kinda new magic the church is employing!?
...It's called an AIM Diffusion Field and it's different for everyone. I'm an electromaster and my friend, Kuroko, is a teleporter.
...almost all the residents there have at least some kind of special ability. With many schools and universities set up to further that power.
...There are only seven Level 5 Espers in total at the moment. I'm ranked third out of those seven... hehe! I'm pretty powerful!
...District 7 is where Tokiwadai and the other schools are located and District 15 is the city's shopping and commerce center. Just to name a few!
I wonder what ~name~'ll remove next?
I'd take off my hair clip but, ya know, I kinda need it to hold my hair together!
...I'd probably do the same if I had any small stuff left.
Kinda makes me wish I'd worn my Gekota bracelet.
I shoulda thought of doing that...
This game is kinda interesting, I wonder if the others'll play it...
Hmm... I shoulda thought about wearing something small like that.
That reminds me... I should stop by the mart on the way home...
Sooner or later you'll end up as naked as me!
Even though I'm stood here naked, I'm having quite a fun time with you.
Was th-that the right... -hnng- ...choice?
You'll eventually be as naked as I am!
I know a good store where you can get more of those!
Heh! You totally deserve that! Serves you right...
Whaa!? You seriously should take off two things if you're going for something small like that!
Going for the small stuff...good. Keep it that way.
As long as you keep it to the smaller stuff! I don't wanna see any of you getting fully naked!
Fine, go ahead and remove your ~clothing~!
Yeah, yeah... I get it. Just remove your ~clothing~ already!
Your ~clothing~? Ehh... at least it's something.
I'm totally okay with it if you're only gonna take of your ~clothing~, ~name~!
I'm almost naked and you're only taking off your ~clothing~ this round!?
Ooooh... What're you hiding under there?
If you wanna take off your ~clothing~, then go for it, I guess.
Just hurry up and take off your ~clothing~, ~name~! I don't like the fact you've still got stuff on!
Going for your ~clothing~... th-this time, huh?
I guess your ~clothing~ isn't too bad of a choice... hehe.
When the festival was on, they had stalls that sold stuff like your ~clothing~. I shoulda bought one!
Okay then, let's keep going!
Just... as long as you keep away from me, we're fine!
I totally get why you wouldn't remove anything bigger!
Just don't go thinking you're gonna win this, okay!?
Maybe you should step it up a bit, next round!
Hehe! One step closer to me winning this thing!
Ehhh... fine. You'd better make it up to me next round, though!
Just throwing it on the ground, huh? My dorm Housemaster would scold us for something like that.
(I kinda wanna see ~name~ take off something more) W-wait... this isn't like me!
Am I distracting you? Will it make you lose the next hand, too.?
I... -uhhn- ...suppose i-it's okay.
I wonder if you're gonna take off more... W-wait a sec! I... uh... meant somethin' else!
I usually don't mix well with guys, but you're actually kinda nice...
My friend, Kuroko, is quite... uhhh... eccentric to say the least. She's totally crazy about me for some reason...
My friends, Saten and Uiharu, don't go to Tokiwadai like Kuroko and I do. They go to Sakugawa High School instead...
H-hey... are any of you collecting Gekota figurines...? It's this frog mascot that all the kids are talking about...
My Esper ability is known as Electromaster. It allows me to control, manifest and manipulate lightning and electricity...
Ehh!? I think I can see Cammy's... outline ... through her pants!
Wait!? You were a z-zombie this entire time!? ...Saten was right, they really do exist!
Woah! Cammy, I can kinda see the outline of your... parts!
Woah!? Saten was right!! Th-they totally do exist!
I don't recognize that uniform... are you from Academy City?
I don't recognize that school uniform... are you from Academy City?
You're still gonna look cute either way!
Ah, your ~clothing~... I see how it is.
I think my friend Saten might like this game! She's always flipping Uiharu's skirt in public, hehe!
Hey, I removed something similar when I last stripped. It's not too bad!
Me and the other girls would play a game in the dorms where we would remove stuff like this...
Of course! Your ~clothing~! Kinda makes sense if you ask me.
Kuroko would probably ask you to take off more, hehe...
Really, ~name~!? I've barely got anything left and you're only gonna take off your ~clothing~!?
Can't be worse than where I'm at, ~name~. Can it?
Going for your ~clothing~ Eh? I wouldn't mind seeing a bit more...
Alright then... your ~clothing~. The sooner you're as naked as I am, the better!
Removing y-your ~clothing~ I... -hnng- ...see.
Your ~clothing~, huh? I wouldn't mind it if you showed a bit more.
There's a store in District 15 that sells stuff kinda like your ~clothing~, ya know?
Seriously!? Play fair! You coulda removed the entire thing...
Ohhh... I see why you didn't wanna take off your gloves, Kyoko.
Are you serious!? You shoulda taken off the entire thing...
Ohh I get it now, Kyoko... You were using them to hide your hands this entire time.
...She even managed to become my room-mate, even though she's in a lower year! I dunno what her deal is, really.
...They're both actually really nice people! I'm glad to have met them. Even though we go to different schools, we still hang out together whenever we can!
...I was just wondering, ya know. I-it's not like I would care about some stupid kids toy!
...It also gives me a degree of magnetic control, too! Through electro-magnetism, I can even create weaponry from iron particles found in the ground!
Hey, don't sweat it! Let's keep going!
Sometimes... it's good to start small and work your way up when you have the confidence!
See... not too bad, right?
I'm getting kinda interested, seeing you take off your ~clothing~!
Things are getting more and more risky, ~name~!
You're one step closer to the end, ~name~!
Hey, at least you're one step closer!
We should totally hang out after this! We have this cafe we usually go to and they serve the best sundaes.
You can't have much left to take off now, right!?
Alright! I'm still gonna win, though! Well... hehe ...I hope I do.
Your ~clothing~... -ohhh- ...was k-kinda cute.
You should be getting closer now, right?
I'm actually really glad I've met you. I like to make new friends, ya know...
Hehe! Karma's finally caught up with you!
Seriously!? I don't even think I'd wanna see what's under there!
Whaa!? ~Name~? Removing your ~clothing~!? Why not something a little less... revealing.
Woah!? You must really want to get in to this...
W-wait!? You're removing your ~clothing~!?
Hey, ~name~!? Are you just showin' off!? It didn't end well for the last guy who tried doing that.
Ehh!? Your ~clothing~?
Like I actually want to see you take off ~clothing~... punk!
He's taking off his ~clothing~!? I think I should join in on this...
Your ~clothing~!? Just remember who you're with, okay!
Finally! You shouldn't keep a girl waiting, okay!
If Kuroko finds out about this, I won't hear the end of it all week...
You're gonna take off your ~clothing~!? Well, I uhh...
Wow, ~name~'s taking off his ~clothing~! None of the guys I've ever met would do that willingly...
You're t-taking your ~clothing~ off! I... -unnf- ...was k-kinda hoping so...
Taking off your ~clothing~ is a big move! You thinking of joining me?
As long as you aren't like the guys from the schools in District 18, then I'm fine with it.
Well... we are on the beach after all.
You seriously think I'd wanna join you in the hot springs, ~name~!
Kinda fitting, seeing as we're on a beach and all...
I really hope you're not gonna go further than that!
Just don't go parading around like that!
Now I understand why boys want to show off all the time.
As long as you don't go further than that, I think we're okay...
I wonder what's under there...? AHH! I mean, put your ~clothing~ back on!
